effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.sword_shield: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
